DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate long-term safety side effect baricitinib participant complete previous baricitinib rheumatoid arthritis study . The study provide 5 year additional treatment baricitinib .
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Study Participants With Moderate Severe Rheumatoid Arthritis
